overclocks.name: Eraser
overclocks.description: Clean up the caves with an expanded magazine combined with the ability to acquire more locks.

overclocks.name: Armor Break Module

buffs: More Armor Damage at Full Lock

overclocks.description: Shots do extra damage against armor when all locks are engaged.

overclocks.name: Explosive Chemical Rounds
overclocks.description: Every enemy with at least three locks triggers an explosion on the last shot.

overclocks.name: Seeker Rounds
overclocks.description: Locked shots will always hit their target, even finding their way around heavy armor. The system can also maintain locks at more extreme angles. However, the extra processing load reduces the rate of fire for locked shots and more care must be taken when reloading the advanced rounds.

overclocks.name: Executioner
overclocks.description: Tweaks to the fire control mechanism and camera software bring lightning-fast lock acquisition and more weakspot damage when all locks are engaged. However, the max number of locks is reduced, as is the magazine and total ammo capacity.

overclocks.name: Neuro-Lasso
overclocks.description: Slow down enemies by locking on to them: the more locks, the slower the enemy gets! The downside is a slightly slower lock-on rate, and the locks can only be maintained for a limited time before the system resets.
